Firstly, this was one of the most cheaply-made clothing items I have ever bought.  The fit was horrendous and the material looked like a wet sheep.  And then to make matters worse… Amazon is refusing to give me my refund.  I bought a Small and a Medium.  They gave me the refund for the Small but are refusing to give me the refund for the Medium.  Today, I tried for the 3rd time to get my refund.  We’re talking about $41.13.  I returned the item on December 1st.  They are giving me some song and dance that I used a coupon for the purchase —- which I didn’t.  Amazon made a mistake and I’m paying for it.  And on top of that, I couldn’t have been treated more rudely or condescendingly by their customer service reps.  And 2 days before Christmas.  Just shocking.  Needless to say, I will have to pursue my refund with my credit card company.  I am beyond astonished.  Amazon is going downhill.  I don’t know how anyone can trust them.

评论概述: Cozy and Comfortable, but Could Be Thicker
评论详情: This oversized sweater is super comfortable and cozy—perfect for lounging or a casual fall day. It’s great for mild weather, but on colder days, you’ll definitely need to layer up. Overall, it’s a great addition to my wardrobe, but a bit more warmth would’ve made it perfect!

评论概述: Great deal on super soft sweater
评论详情: Pairs well with jeans, shorts, linen pants, skirts and is very soft material. Has a nice stretch yet runs oversized so I do recommend sizing down. I bought my size and it fit baggy which is why I did not give five stars. It's casual or can dress up an outfit. I wore in the evening for an outdoor music festival we went to. It's great for a cool night stroll, sweater is super cute. I got the red is a vibrant bold color, looks beautiful.

I was looking forward to an oversized, cozy sweater to wear to work, because my office is always cold. We'll, it's cozy. The sleeves are nice and loose, and go down to my fingertips. But that's the only thing "oversized" about it. It's basically a cropped sweater with baggy sleeves. I read so many reviews to figure out what size to get and it was mixed. So I ordered a large. I have a 36C+ chest with broad shoulders and a shorter torso, so I thought it would be fine. It fits well, if I wanted a cropped sweater. But I prefer to have my backside covered. So, be warned, it's a nice sweater, which is why I'm not returning it, but definitely NOT what I was looking for.
Love it! Super thick and soft.

I recently snagged the Casual Crewneck Pullover Long Sleeve sweater, for the second time. I have the orange and now the camel color.it's become my latest wardrobe obsession.  First off, the comfort level is off the charts. It's like being wrapped in a warm hug, and the material is soft against the skin without being too heavy. Perfect for those chilly days, The crewneck design is a game-changer, not too tight, not too loose. The fit is just right, making it versatile for various occasions.  The sleeves: they're long enough to keep my hands warm and add an extra touch of coziness. You can pair it with jeans for a casual outing, toss it over leggings for a laid-back look. I have had my orange sweater for four months and it's holding up like a champ. After multiple washes, it hasn't lost its shape or color.
